data.text: Namwe iwakulu muwatendele iwatumwa wenu pfinoghile na ka pfayobama Imulungu, mkumbuke ka namwe pfipfila mna Imtwatsa kulanga.
Mumlombe Imulungu bila ukwipfa, na hamlomba mwalangitse na mlonge imighede kwe Imulungu.
Pfipfila mtulombele na twetwe ili Imulungu atufughulile libani kwaajili ya mbuli yake ing'aimanyike, ili tudahe kulonga imbuli ya Kiristu. Kwaajili ya imbuli ayo sambi namchifungo.
Lelo mlombe ili nidahe kulonga ka pfanibamighwa, na imbuli ayo pfaitsokwikighwa mwatsimwatsi.
Muwe ne inzewele pfamkala ne iwanu ing'awomtoghola Kiristu, muitumile ghoya nyafwasi yamwinawo.
Ghamatsuwa ghose mlonge ghanoghile na ighowapfila iwanu, kuya mmanye kuwedika ghoya iwanu wose.
Nomtuma Tukiko kuna mwemwe, yeye ndughu mnoghelighwa, msang'ana mwenyepfale na imtumwa miyetu mne isang'ano ye Imtwatsa, katsomlongelani mbuli tsangu tsose.
Nomtuma kuna mwemwe ili awaghumeni ghumoyo kwa kuwalongela mbuli tsetu.
Kakutsa na Onesimo, ndughu yetu mnoghelighwa na mwenyepfale, ayo ka miyenu. Watsomwing'ani mbuli tse ipfinu pfose ipfitendeka hano.
Aristariko, yali mchifungo na nene, kowalamsani na Maliki, binamu yake Balinaba pfipfila kowalamsani. Ma tsampata malaghitso ghake, ang'apfika mumbokele.
Naye Yoshua iyokemighwa Yusti kowalamsani. Mghati mwe Wayahudi iwabokele inoghola, hawano waliyeka iwosang'ana na nene kwaajili ya undewa we Imulungu, nawo wonguma ghumoyo ghendo.
Epafura, mwenyekaye miyenu, mtumwa wa Yesu Kiristu komlamsani, ghamatsuwa ghose yeye ng'akwipfa bae kumlombelani ili mkomale, mwime ghendo na mghendelele kutoghola na kutenda ighamnoghela Imulungu.
Nodaha kulapfa ukalangama ka kosang'ana ng'ani kwaajili ya mwemwe na kwaajili ye iwanu wa Laodikiya na awala iwali Hiyerapoli.
Luka, ayula mghanga wetu mnoghelighwa, na Dema womlamsani.
Muwalamse iwandughu iwali Laodikiya, na Nimfa na iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu iwetingana mne ing'anda yake.
Mng'amalitsa kuisoma ibaluwa ino, weng'eni na wayenu iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu wa Laodikiya nawo waisome, ne ibaluwa yaniwaandikile awala wa Laodikiya wamwing'eni mwemwe, namwe muisome.
Na mumlongele Arikipo aitende ghoya isang'ano ila yeng'ighwe ne Imtwatsa.
Nene Pauli nakwandika ghano kwa ghumoko ghwangu mwenyegho kuwalamsani. Mkumbuke kuwa nene na mchifungo. Uluso we Imulungu ukale namwe.
